item.description:
Hi, all! There are still a few seats left in this 5-class course starting this coming Wednesday at the Adult Learning Center in Nashua.

This course is designed for anyone who has a reasonably good grasp of fundamental WordPress concepts and techniques and wants to take full command and control of their WordPress website and get the maximum benefit out of it. The course focuses primarily on:

- Best practices for managing and securing a WordPress site
- Extending, enhancing and refining the design of your site
- Bringing more traffic to your site...and engaging users once they get there
- Must-have plugins
- and more!

To see all the details and to register for the course: http://yourpresenceontheweb.com/wp171

Tuition for the five classes is $160.00

Feel free to contact me if you have any questions.

Cheers, Jonathan

group.name: Manchester, NH WordPress Developers and Users

item.name: Advanced Topics in WordPress course starting THIS WEEK!
